blocks.name: cexp
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include exponentiation of a complex number to an integer power.
blocks.origin: const class cexp { ^ }

blocks.name: diff.cexp.s
diff.cexp.c
diff.cexp.w
df-exp
blocks.content: Define exponentiation to nonnegative integer powers. For example, ` ( 5 ^ 2 ) = 2 5 ` ( ~ ex-exp ). Terminology: In general, "exponentiation" is the operation of raising a "base" ` x ` to the power of the "exponent" ` y ` , resulting in the "power" ` ( x ^ y ) ` , also called "x to the power of y". In this case, "integer exponentiation" is the operation of raising a complex "base" ` x ` to the power of an integer ` y ` , resulting in the "integer power" ` ( x ^ y ) ` . This definition is not meant to be used directly; instead, ~ exp0 and ~ expp1 provide the standard recursive definition. The up-arrow notation is used by Donald Knuth for iterated exponentiation (_Science_ 194, 1235-1242, 1976) and is convenient for us since we don't have superscripts. 10-Jun-2005: The definition was extended to include zero exponents, so that ` 0 ^ 0 = 1 ` per the convention of Definition 10-4.1 of [Gleason] p. 134 ( ~ 0exp0e1 ). 4-Jun-2014: The definition was extended to include negative integer exponents. For example, ` ( -u 3 ^ -u 2 ) = ( 1 / 9 ) ` ( ~ ex-exp ). The case ` x = 0 , y < 0 ` gives the value ` ( 1 / 0 ) ` , so we will avoid this case in our theorems. For a definition of exponentiation including complex exponents see ~ df-cxp (complex exponentiation). Both definitions are equivalent for integer exponents, see ~ cxpexpz . (Contributed by Raph Levien, 20-May-2004.) (Revised by NM, 15-Oct-2004.)

blocks.name: expval
blocks.content: Value of exponentiation to integer powers. (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm expval(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c0, cexp, c1), cif(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wceq(c1, nat0))))
} = {
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, cc, c1, cz, cexp, cif(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wceq(c1, nat0)), cif(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs1)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(cv(hs0)))), cneg(cv(hs1)))), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs1), nat0)))
  ifbieq2d(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs1)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(cv(hs0)))), cneg(cv(hs1)))), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(hs1))), cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs1), nat0), wceq(c1, nat0))
  eqeq1d(cv(hs1), nat0, c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  ifbieq12d(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs1)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(cv(hs0)))), cneg(cv(hs1)))), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  breq2d(nat0, clt, cv(hs1), c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  fveq12d(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs1), cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(cv(hs0)))), cneg(cv(hs1))), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  fveq12d(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(cv(hs0)))), cneg(cv(hs1)), cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  seqeq3d(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(cv(hs0))), cxp(cn, csn(c0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  xpeq2d(cn, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  sneqd(cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  negeqd(cv(hs1), c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  df-exp(hs0, hs1)
  ifex(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wceq(c1, nat0))
  1ex()
  ifex(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  fvex(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1)
  ovex(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(cif(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wceq(c1, nat0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.c(cif(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wceq(c1, nat0)))
}

blocks.name: expnnval
blocks.content: Value of exponentiation to positive integer powers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm expnnval(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cexp, c1), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1)))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cexp, c1), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), cif(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wceq(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn), wceq(co(c0, cexp, c1), cif(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wceq(c1, nat0))), wcel(c1, cz))
  nnz(c1)
  expval(c0, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn), wceq(cif(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wceq(c1, nat0)), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1)))
  eqtrd(cif(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wceq(c1, nat0)), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wcel(c1, cn))
  iffalsed(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wcel(c1, cn), wceq(c1, nat0))
  neneqd(c1, nat0, wcel(c1, cn))
  nnne0(c1)
  iftrued(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1))), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  nngt0(c1)
}

blocks.name: exp0
blocks.content: Value of a complex number raised to the 0th power. Note that under our definition, ` 0 ^ 0 = 1 ` , following the convention used by Gleason. Part of Definition 10-4.1 of [Gleason] p. 134. (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: 0exp0e1
blocks.content: ` 0 ^ 0 = 1 ` . This is our convention. It follows the convention used by Gleason; see Part of Definition 10-4.1 of [Gleason] p. 134. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 8-Dec-2018.)

blocks.name: exp1
blocks.content: Value of a complex number raised to the first power. (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm exp1(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(c0, cexp, nat1), c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cexp, nat1), c0, cfv(cxp(cn, csn(c0)), nat1), wcel(c0, cc))
  syl6eq(co(c0, cexp, nat1), cfv(cxp(cn, csn(c0)), nat1), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), nat1), wcel(c0, cc))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(c0, cexp, nat1), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), nat1)), wcel(nat1, cn))
  expnnval(c0, nat1)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), nat1), cfv(cxp(cn, csn(c0)), nat1)), wcel(nat1, cz))
  1z()
  seq1(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0)))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(cxp(cn, csn(c0)), nat1), c0), wcel(nat1, cn))
  1nn()
  fvconst2g(c0, cc, nat1, cn)
}

blocks.name: expp1
blocks.content: Value of a complex number raised to a nonnegative integer power plus one. Part of Definition 10-4.1 of [Gleason] p. 134. (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm expp1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(co(c0, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cexp, c1), cmul, c0)))
} = {
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0), wceq(co(c0, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cexp, c1), cmul, c0)), wo(wcel(c1, cn), wceq(c1, nat0)))
  elnn0(c1)
  jaodan(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn), wceq(c1, nat0), wceq(co(c0, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cexp, c1), cmul, c0)))
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cexp, c1), cmul, c0), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), cmul, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  eqtrd(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), cmul, c0), co(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), cmul, cfv(cxp(cn, csn(c0)), co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn), wceq(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), cmul, cfv(cxp(cn, csn(c0)), co(c1, caddc, nat1)))))
  eleq2s(c1, cn, cfv(cuz, nat1), wceq(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), cmul, cfv(cxp(cn, csn(c0)), co(c1, caddc, nat1)))))
  seqp1(c1, nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0)))
  nnuz()
  oveq2d(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), cmul, cfv(cxp(cn, csn(c0)), co(c1, caddc, nat1)), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn), wceq(cfv(cxp(cn, csn(c0)), co(c1, caddc, nat1)), c0), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cn))
  fvconst2g(c0, cc, co(c1, caddc, nat1), cn)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn), wceq(co(c0, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cn))
  peano2nn(c1)
  expnnval(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1))
  oveq1d(co(c0, cexp, c1), cmul, c0, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  expnnval(c0, c1)
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cexp, c1), cmul, c0), co(c0, cexp, nat1), co(nat1, cmul, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(c1, nat0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(c1, nat0), wceq(co(c0, cexp, nat1), co(nat1, cmul, c0)))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, cexp, nat1), co(nat1, cmul, c0), c0, wcel(c0, cc))
  exp1(c0)
  mulid2(c0)
  oveq2d(c0, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1), nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(c1, nat0)))
  syl6eq(co(c1, caddc, nat1), nat1, co(nat0, caddc, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(c1, nat0)))
  oveq1d(c1, caddc, nat1, nat0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(c1, nat0)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(c1, nat0))
  0p1e1()
  oveq1d(co(c0, cexp, c1), cmul, c0, nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(c1, nat0)))
  sylan9eqr(co(c0, cexp, c1), nat1, co(c0, cexp, nat0), wcel(c0, cc), wceq(c1, nat0))
  oveq2(c1, nat0, c0, cexp)
  exp0(c0)
}

blocks.name: expneg
blocks.content: Value of a complex number raised to a negative integer power. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm expneg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(co(c0, cexp, cneg(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, cexp, c1))))
} = {
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0), wceq(co(c0, cexp, cneg(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, cexp, c1))), wo(wcel(c1, cn), wceq(c1, nat0)))
  elnn0(c1)
  jaodan(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn), wceq(c1, nat0), wceq(co(c0, cexp, cneg(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, cexp, c1))))
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, cexp, cneg(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, cexp, c1)), cif(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(cneg(c1)))), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c1))), wceq(cneg(c1), nat0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  3eqtrd(cif(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(cneg(c1)))), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c1))), wceq(cneg(c1), nat0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1)), cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(cneg(c1)))), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c1))), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(cneg(c1)))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  iffalsed(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(cneg(c1)))), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(cneg(c1), nat0))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)), wn(wceq(cneg(c1), nat0)), wne(c1, nat0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn), wne(c1, nat0))
  nnne0(c1)
  necon3abid(c1, nat0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(cneg(c1), nat0))
  negeq0d(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  iffalsed(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(cneg(c1)))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c1)))
  mtbid(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c1)), wbr(c1, clt, nat0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)), wn(wbr(c1, clt, nat0)), wcel(c1, cn0))
  nn0nlt0(c1)
  lt0neg1d(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  nn0red(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c1, cn0))
  nnnn0(c1)
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(cneg(c1))), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  fveq2d(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(cneg(c1)), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  negnegd(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c1, cc))
  nncn(c1)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn), wceq(co(c0, cexp, cneg(c1)), cif(nat1, cif(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), cneg(cneg(c1)))), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c1))), wceq(cneg(c1), nat0))), wcel(cneg(c1), cz))
  nnnegz(c1)
  expval(c0, cneg(c1))
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, cexp, c1), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cxp(cn, csn(c0))), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn)))
  expnnval(c0, c1)
  3eqtr4a(co(c0, cexp, cneg(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, cexp, c1)), nat1, co(nat1, cdiv, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(c1, nat0)))
  eqcomi(nat1, co(nat1, cdiv, nat1))

  syl5ibr(wceq(cv(hs0), cneg(nat1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cpr(cneg(nat1), nat1)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cpr(cneg(nat1), nat1)), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1)), cpr(cneg(nat1), nat1)))
  eqeltrd(co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1)), cpr(cneg(nat1), nat1), cneg(cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cpr(cneg(nat1), nat1)))
  mulm1d(cv(hs1), wcel(cv(hs1), cpr(cneg(nat1), nat1)))

  oveq1(cv(hs0), nat1, cmul, cv(hs1))

blocks.name: expclzlem
blocks.content: Closure law for integer exponentiation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm expclzlem(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  anabss3(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wi(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))))
  sylanbr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wne(c0, nat0), wi(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))), wcel(c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  eldifsn(c0, cc, nat0)
  3expia(wcel(c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  expcl2lem(hs0, hs1, c0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), c1)
  difss(cc, csn(nat0))
  syl2anb(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wne(cv(hs1), nat0)))
  eldifsn(cv(hs1), cc, nat0)
  sylanbrc(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wne(cv(hs1), nat0))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cc), wne(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat0))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wne(cv(hs0), nat0), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wne(cv(hs1), nat0), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cc))
  mulcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  mulne0(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  eldifsn(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cc, nat0)
  mpbir2an(wcel(nat1, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(nat1, cc), wne(nat1, nat0))
  ax-1cn()
  ax-1ne0()
  eldifsn(nat1, cc, nat0)
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wne(cv(hs0), nat0), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  3imtr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wa(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cc), wne(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), nat0)))
  jca(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cc), wne(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  reccl(cv(hs0))
  recne0(cv(hs0))
  eldifsn(cv(hs0), cc, nat0)
  eldifsn(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cc, nat0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))

thm expclzlem(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c0 ≠ 0 ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)→(c0[^]c1)∈(ℂ \ { 0 }))
} = {
  3impia(c0 ∈ ℂ, c0 ≠ 0, c1 ∈ ℤ, (c0[^]c1)∈(ℂ \ { 0 }))
  anabss3(c0 ∈ ℂ, c0 ≠ 0, (c1 ∈ ℤ →(c0[^]c1)∈(ℂ \ { 0 })))
  sylanbr((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c0 ≠ 0), c0 ≠ 0, (c1 ∈ ℤ →(c0[^]c1)∈(ℂ \ { 0 })), c0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }))
  eldifsn(c0, cc, nat0)
  3expia(c0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), c0 ≠ 0, c1 ∈ ℤ, (c0[^]c1)∈(ℂ \ { 0 }))
  expcl2lem(hs0, hs1, c0, (ℂ \ { 0 }), c1)
  difss(cc, { 0 })
  syl2anb(hs0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), hs1 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), (hs0[×]hs1)∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 ≠ 0), (hs1 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ≠ 0))
  eldifsn(hs1, cc, nat0)
  sylanbrc(((hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 ≠ 0)∧(hs1 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ≠ 0)), (hs0[×]hs1)∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), (hs0[×]hs1)∈ ℂ, (hs0[×]hs1)≠ 0)
  ad2ant2r(hs0 ∈ ℂ, hs0 ≠ 0, hs1 ∈ ℂ, hs1 ≠ 0, (hs0[×]hs1)∈ ℂ)
  mulcl(hs0, hs1)
  mulne0(hs0, hs1)
  eldifsn((hs0[×]hs1), cc, nat0)
  mpbir2an(1 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), 1 ∈ ℂ, 1 ≠ 0)
  ax-1cn()
  ax-1ne0()
  eldifsn(nat1, cc, nat0)
  adantr(hs0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), hs0 ≠ 0, (1[÷]hs0)∈(ℂ \ { 0 }))
  3imtr4i(hs0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), (1[÷]hs0)∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 ≠ 0), ((1[÷]hs0)∈ ℂ ∧(1[÷]hs0)≠ 0))
  jca((hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 ≠ 0), (1[÷]hs0)∈ ℂ, (1[÷]hs0)≠ 0)
  reccl(hs0)
  recne0(hs0)
  eldifsn(hs0, cc, nat0)
  eldifsn((1[÷]hs0), cc, nat0)

  diff.hs1.c(c0)

thm expm1t(class c0, class c1) {

blocks.content: Nonnegative integer exponentiation of a reciprocal. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jun-2014.)

thm exprec(class c0, class c1) {

  recidd(c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cz)))
  syl221anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), cexp, c1), co(co(c0, cexp, c1), cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cexp, c1))), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cc), wne(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), nat0), wcel(c1, cz))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cz))

blocks.name: expmul
blocks.content: Product of exponents law for positive integer exponentiation. Proposition 10-4.2(b) of [Gleason] p. 135, restricted to nonnegative integer exponents. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jan-2006.)

blocks.name: expmulz
blocks.content: Product of exponents law for integer exponentiation. Proposition 10-4.2(b) of [Gleason] p. 135. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: m1expeven
blocks.content: Exponentiation of negative one to an even power. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm m1expeven(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), nat1))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), nat1, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(c0, caddc, c0)), co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  oveq2d(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(nat2, cmul, c0), co(c0, caddc, c0), wcel(c0, cz))
  2timesd(c0, wcel(c0, cz))
  zcn(c0)
  anidms(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(c0, caddc, c0)), co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0))))
  mpanl12(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c0, cz)), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(c0, caddc, c0)), co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0))), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc), wne(cneg(nat1), nat0))
  neg1cn()
  neg1ne0()
  expaddz(cneg(nat1), c0, c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0)), nat1), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cpr(cneg(nat1), nat1)))
  m1expcl2(c0)
  sylbi(wcel(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cpr(cneg(nat1), nat1)), wceq(co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0)), nat1), wo(wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cneg(nat1)), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), nat1)))
  elpr(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cneg(nat1), nat1)
  ovex(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0)
  jaoi(wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cneg(nat1)), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), nat1), wceq(co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0)), nat1))
  syl6eq(co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0)), nat1, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1)), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cneg(nat1)))
  anidms(wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cneg(nat1)), wceq(co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0)), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1))))
  oveq12(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cneg(nat1), co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cneg(nat1), cmul)
  neg1mulneg1e1()
  syl6eq(co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0)), nat1, co(nat1, cmul, nat1), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), nat1))
  anidms(wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), nat1), wceq(co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cmul, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0)), co(nat1, cmul, nat1)))
  oveq12(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), nat1, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), nat1, cmul)
  1t1e1()
}

blocks.name: expsub
blocks.content: Exponent subtraction law for nonnegative integer exponentiation. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm expsub(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz))), wceq(co(c0, cexp, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(c0, cexp, c1), cdiv, co(c0, cexp, c2))))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(c0, cexp, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(c0, cexp, c1), cdiv, co(c0, cexp, c2)), co(c0, cexp, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2))), co(co(c0, cexp, c1), cmul, co(c0, cexp, cneg(c2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz))))
  sylanr2(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(c0, cexp, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2))), co(co(c0, cexp, c1), cmul, co(c0, cexp, cneg(c2)))), wcel(cneg(c2), cz))
  znegcl(c2)
  expaddz(c0, c1, cneg(c2))
  oveq2d(c0, cexp, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2)), co(c1, cmin, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2)), co(c1, cmin, c2)))
  syl2an(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2)), co(c1, cmin, c2)), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  zcn(c1)
  zcn(c2)
  negsub(c1, c2)

  adantrl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wne(co(c0, cexp, c2), nat0))

  exprec(c1, c2)

thm ltexp2a(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wbr(co(c0, cexp, c1), clt, co(c0, cexp, c2)))

  rpred(co(c0, cexp, c1), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))
  mpbird(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wbr(co(nat1, cmul, co(c0, cexp, c1)), clt, co(c0, cexp, c2)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(c0, cexp, c2), cdiv, co(c0, cexp, c1))))
  breqtrd(nat1, clt, co(co(c0, cexp, c2), cdiv, co(c0, cexp, c1)), co(c0, cexp, co(c2, cmin, c1)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cexp, co(c2, cmin, c1))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c1), cn), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))
  mpbid(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c1), cn), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  simprr(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wb(wbr(c1, clt, c2), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c1), cn)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz))
  znnsub(c1, c2)

  syl22anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wceq(co(c0, cexp, co(c2, cmin, c1)), co(co(c0, cexp, c2), cdiv, co(c0, cexp, c1))), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  recnd(c0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))
  gt0ne0d(c0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))
  expsub(c0, c2, c1)
  ltmuldivd(nat1, co(c0, cexp, c1), co(c0, cexp, c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))
  rpred(co(c0, cexp, c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))

  a1i(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wbr(nat0, clt, nat1))

  simpl2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wa(wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(c1, clt, c2)))

blocks.name: expcan
blocks.content: Cancellation law for exponentiation. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm expcan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cexp, c1), co(c0, cexp, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
} = {
  bicomd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cexp, c1), co(c0, cexp, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  3imp1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wb(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(co(c0, cexp, c1), co(c0, cexp, c2))))
  com24(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wb(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(co(c0, cexp, c1), co(c0, cexp, c2))))
  exp43(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(co(c0, cexp, c1), co(c0, cexp, c2))))
  ancom2s(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(co(c0, cexp, c1), co(c0, cexp, c2))))
  eqord1(hs0, hs1, c1, cz, c2, co(c0, cexp, c1), co(c0, cexp, c2), co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, cexp)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cexp)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0, cexp)
  zssre()
  rpred(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)))
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), crp), wcel(c0, crp))
  elrpd(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)))
  lttrd(nat0, c0, nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)))
  0red(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)))
  1red(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, nat1))
  0lt1()
  simpr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))
  rpexpcl(c0, cv(hs0))
  syl31anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), clt, co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)))
  expr(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), clt, co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1))))
  ltexp2a(c0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cexp, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cexp, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(co(c0, cexp, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(co(c0, cexp, c2))

  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)))

blocks.pretty:
thm expcan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)∧ 1[<]c0)→((c0[^]c1)=(c0[^]c2)↔ c1 = c2))
} = {
  bicomd(((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)∧ 1[<]c0), (c0[^]c1)=(c0[^]c2), c1 = c2)
  3imp1(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℤ, 1[<]c0, (c1 = c2 ↔(c0[^]c1)=(c0[^]c2)))
  com24(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℤ, 1[<]c0, (c1 = c2 ↔(c0[^]c1)=(c0[^]c2)))
  exp43(c0 ∈ ℝ, 1[<]c0, c2 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, (c1 = c2 ↔(c0[^]c1)=(c0[^]c2)))
  ancom2s((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 1[<]c0), c2 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, (c1 = c2 ↔(c0[^]c1)=(c0[^]c2)))
  eqord1(hs0, hs1, c1, cz, c2, (c0[^]c1), (c0[^]c2), (c0[^]hs0), (c0[^]hs1), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 1[<]c0))
  oveq2(hs0, hs1, c0, cexp)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, c0, cexp)
  oveq2(hs0, c2, c0, cexp)
  zssre()
  rpred((c0[^]hs0), ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 1[<]c0)∧ hs0 ∈ ℤ))
  sylan((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 1[<]c0), hs0 ∈ ℤ, (c0[^]hs0)∈ ℝ+, c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  elrpd(c0, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 1[<]c0))
  lttrd(nat0, c0, nat1, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 1[<]c0))
  0red((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 1[<]c0))
  1red((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 1[<]c0))
  simpl(c0 ∈ ℝ, 1[<]c0)
  a1i((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 1[<]c0), 0[<]1)
  0lt1()
  simpr(c0 ∈ ℝ, 1[<]c0)
  rpexpcl(c0, hs0)
  syl31anc(((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 1[<]c0)∧(hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℤ)), (hs0[<]hs1 →(c0[^]hs0)[<](c0[^]hs1)), c0 ∈ ℝ, hs0 ∈ ℤ, hs1 ∈ ℤ, 1[<]c0)
  simpll(c0 ∈ ℝ, 1[<]c0, (hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℤ))
  simprl((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 1[<]c0), hs0 ∈ ℤ, hs1 ∈ ℤ)
  simprr((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 1[<]c0), hs0 ∈ ℤ, hs1 ∈ ℤ)
  simplr(c0 ∈ ℝ, 1[<]c0, (hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℤ))
  expr((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℤ), 1[<]c0, hs0[<]hs1, (c0[^]hs0)[<](c0[^]hs1))
  ltexp2a(c0, hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[^]c1))
  diff.hs0.c((c0[^]c2))
  diff.hs0.c((c0[^]hs1))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((c0[^]c1))

thm leexp2r(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  uzind4i(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn0)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, cexp, c2), cle, co(c0, cexp, c1))), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn0)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cle, co(c0, cexp, c1))), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn0)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, cexp, c1), cle, co(c0, cexp, c1))), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn0)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)), cle, co(c0, cexp, c1))), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn0)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cle, co(c0, cexp, c1))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn0)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cle, co(c0, cexp, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cexp, c1), cle, co(c0, cexp, c1)))
  breq1d(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cle, co(c0, cexp, c1), co(c0, cexp, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))

blocks.name: sqlecan
blocks.content: Cancel one factor of a square in a ` <_ ` comparison. Unlike ~ lemul1 , the common factor ` A ` may be zero. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2008.)

blocks.name: expmulnbnd
blocks.content: Exponentiation with a mantissa greater than 1 is not bounded by any linear function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: digit2
blocks.content: Two ways to express the ` K ` th digit in the decimal (when base ` B = 1 0 ` ) expansion of a number ` A ` . ` K = 1 ` corresponds to the first digit after the decimal point. (Contributed by NM, 25-Dec-2008.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cexp, c2), cmul, c0)), cmo, c1), co(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cexp, c2), cmul, c0)), cmin, co(c1, cmul, cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cexp, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), cmul, c0))))))
} = {

blocks.name: digit1

blocks.name: discr1

blocks.name: discr
blocks.content: If a quadratic polynomial with real coefficients is nonnegative for all values, then its discriminant is nonpositive. (Contributed by NM, 10-Aug-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: exp0d
blocks.content: Value of a complex number raised to the 0th power. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: exp1d
blocks.content: Value of a complex number raised to the first power. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: expeq0d
blocks.content: Positive integer exponentiation is 0 iff its mantissa is 0. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: sqvald
blocks.content: Value of square. Inference version. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: sqcld
blocks.content: Closure of square. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: sqeq0d
blocks.content: A number is zero iff its square is zero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: expcld
blocks.content: Closure law for nonnegative integer exponentiation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: expp1d
blocks.content: Value of a complex number raised to a nonnegative integer power plus one. Part of Definition 10-4.1 of [Gleason] p. 134. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: expaddd
blocks.content: Sum of exponents law for nonnegative integer exponentiation. Proposition 10-4.2(a) of [Gleason] p. 135. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: expmuld
blocks.content: Product of exponents law for positive integer exponentiation. Proposition 10-4.2(b) of [Gleason] p. 135, restricted to nonnegative integer exponents. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: sqrecd
blocks.content: Square of reciprocal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: expclzd
blocks.content: Closure law for integer exponentiation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: expne0d
blocks.content: Nonnegative integer exponentiation is nonzero if its mantissa is nonzero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: expnegd
blocks.content: Value of a complex number raised to a negative power. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: exprecd
blocks.content: Nonnegative integer exponentiation of a reciprocal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: expp1zd
blocks.content: Value of a nonzero complex number raised to an integer power plus one. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: expm1d
blocks.content: Value of a complex number raised to an integer power minus one. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: expsubd
blocks.content: Exponent subtraction law for nonnegative integer exponentiation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: sqmuld
blocks.content: Distribution of square over multiplication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: sqdivd
blocks.content: Distribution of square over division. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: expdivd
blocks.content: Nonnegative integer exponentiation of a quotient. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: mulexpd
blocks.content: Positive integer exponentiation of a product. Proposition 10-4.2(c) of [Gleason] p. 135, restricted to nonnegative integer exponents. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: 0expd
blocks.content: Value of zero raised to a positive integer power. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: reexpcld
blocks.content: Closure of exponentiation of reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: expge0d
blocks.content: Nonnegative integer exponentiation with a nonnegative mantissa is nonnegative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: expge1d
blocks.content: Nonnegative integer exponentiation with a nonnegative mantissa is nonnegative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)

blocks.name: znsqcld
blocks.content: The square of a nonzero integer is a positive integer. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Feb-2020.)
